choice.title: conditional operator
choice.tip: Wrong.The scope operator "::" is used to define namespaces in C++

choice.title: ternary operator
choice.tip: Wrong.The scope operator "::" is used to define namespaces in C++.

choice.title: scope operator
choice.tip: Correct.The scope operator "::" is used to define namespaces in C++

choice.title: pkg
choice.tip: Wrong. "package" is the keyword in java used to define package.

choice.title: pkg
choice.tip: Wrong. "package" is the keyword in java used to define package.

choice.title: package
choice.tip: Correct. "package" is the keyword in java used to define package.

choice.title: import pkg.
choice.tip: Wrong. To import an entire package we use import.packageName.*

choice.title: Import pkg.
choice.tip: Wrong. To import an entire package we use import.packageName.*

choice.title: import pkg.*
choice.tip: Correct. To import an entire package we use import.packageName.*
